## Welcome!

EnviroStats Solutions is a nimble Edmonton-based consulting firm dedicated to delivering efficient and rigorous environmental statistics, data analysis, visualization, and interpretation services. Our focus revolves around the environmental domain, providing practical insights that drive meaningful decisions.

Beyond our analytical prowess, we go the extra mile. We offer professional training in statistics, data management, and visualization, all centered within the versatile R programming environment. These workshops are designed to empower you to confidently navigate the world of data.
